page.title: 15 AN 8 YEAR OLD'S DAY.
page.content: My Mum wakes me in the morning at about quarter past 7 before she goes to work. Before I go to school I play with the computer or I sometimes play games with my sister. I have my breakfast of toast and then I clean my teeth.On my way to school I call for my friend Amy and we walk up together. Just before we go into class at 9o'clock we have a sort of playtime.Amy and I like to play horses.When we go into class we usually do English or Maths. At half past 10 we have playtime. Amy and I again play horses or snakes and dragons.When we come in from play at quarter to 11 we carry on with our English or our Maths.Yesterday I did some of my own research about the N.American Plains Indians and I found out quite a bit.(cont'd on page 16).
